name: Pinna - Unicycle for your nerves
description:
Now its time to wreck your Pinna!

Target is quite simple, just ride your unicycle as far as you can!
Don't worry about falling over, because you will fall... Multiple times.

Press and hold the right side of the screen to cycle forwards and the left side to cycle backwards. Remember to keep the balance on your mind!

-Wont work for anger management
-Minimalist look
-Gamecenter leaderboards
-Simple to learn
-Fast gameplay
-1 in-app to unlock a Wheelie level
-For those who love a tough challenge

Please share your ideas for improvement on Twitter with me @reinkout
